lore: Psychomancers study the science of fear. They are expert manipulators, conjuring phantasms and temporary hard-light constructs that trigger primal survival instincts in their victims’ minds, or overload even the most advanced sensoria. No being is safe from the creeping tendrils of the Psychomancer’s art.

otherAbilities.name: Nightmare Shroud (Aura)
otherAbilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 9" of this model, subtract 1 from the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit.

otherAbilities.name: Harbinger of Despair
otherAbilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit within 18" of this unit. That unit must take a Battle-shock test .
